entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
